title: Deleting model with plugin crashes gzserver

content.raw:
We have a model of a person with an attached lidar plugin.  Whenever we try to delete the model, either from the GUI or using the delete_model service, gzserver crashes.  Is there a way to delete such models without crashing gzserver?

I have attached an example of the SDF of our person with attached lidar.

Thanks,
patrick
content.html:
We have a model of a person with an attached lidar plugin. Whenever we try to delete the model, either from the GUI or using the delete_model service, gzserver crashes. Is there a way to delete such models without crashing gzserver?

I have attached an example of the SDF of our person with attached lidar.

Thanks, patrick
